column1: Kata Robata////We ate here latish on a weeknight and had a mix of sushi
column3: specialty rolls and cold starters. I'd have to say they put a lot more effort into the (much higher priced) specialty rolls and starters than in the standard issue rolls and sushi. The hamachi and jalapenos sashimi was excellent
column4: as was the special salmon sushi. The spicy tuna roll was only so-so
column5: not bad but no better than some of the other 5 sushi restaurants in the 3 block area around them! Â Nice environment
column6: people seemed to have a good time.
